name: Clockwork Sentinel
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond that range), passive Perception 12

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Calculated Sweep
actions.desc: The sentinel makes a melee attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet. On a critical hit  the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

bonus_actions.name: Overclock (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The sentinel takes the Dash action.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The sentinel adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the sentinel is indistinguishable from normal armor.

special_abilities.name: Clockwork Nature
special_abilities.desc: A clockwork doesnt require air, nourishment, or rest, and is immune to disease.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork is immune to any effect that would alter its form.
